presenters.name: Justin O'Halloran
presenters.bio: Full stack web developer and Chapter Lead for Builder Vancouver, focused on guiding local builders through hands-on Bitcoin and Lightning education.
presenters.title: Full Stack Web Developer

presenters.name: Mat Balez
presenters.bio: Product manager at Spiral.xyz helping Bitcoin and Lightning teams ship polished user experiences powered by open-source infrastructure.
presenters.title: Product Manager

presenters.name: Eric Chennels
presenters.bio: Cybersecurity and cloud computing specialist researching and building secure Bitcoin and Lightning deployments for modern infrastructure teams.
presenters.title: Cybersecurity & Cloud Specialist

presenters.name: Martin Montero
presenters.bio: Project manager at Rabble Labs working on Nostr community development and coordinating open collaboration across Bitcoin builders.
presenters.title: Project Manager

presenters.name: JP
presenters.bio: Founder of Bitpoints.me, a Bitcoin-native rewards system that transforms traditional loyalty points into sats. JP manages btlearn.org and built Bitpoints.me from a local coffeeshop hobby project, merging Cashu with Bitchat to create an interoperable, educational rewards platform that teaches people about Bitcoin through familiar UX patterns.
presenters.title: Founder
